terminal.welcome:
Welcome to JGP Terminal v1.0.0
Type 'help' to see available commands.
Type 'about' to learn more about Januar Galuh Prabakti.
terminal.help:
Available commands:

about               - Show information about Januar Galuh Prabakti
skills              - Display technical skills
experience          - Show work experience
education           - Display educational background
projects            - List notable projects
certifications      - Show professional certifications
contact             - Display contact information
clear               - Clear terminal screen
date                - Show current date and time
whoami              - Show current user
ls                  - List directory contents
pwd                 - Print working directory
echo [text]         - Echo text back to terminal
uname -a            - Show system information
help                - Show this help message
exit                - Close terminal
terminal.about.title:
Name:            Januar Galuh Prabakti
Profession:      IT & Cyber Security Enthusiast
Location:        Bekasi, Indonesia
Expertise:       Linux, Cyber Security, IT Support
Interests:       Information Security, Server Administration, Networking

Bio:             Passionate about IT and cyber security with experience in
                 IT support and a strong foundation in Linux systems. Committed
                 to continuous learning and seeking opportunities to grow in
                 the technology field.
